overview.en: Kau is the first solution in the world to use blockchain technology in the environmental protection and carbon emission industry. It is a comprehensive system platform to promote the development of environmental protection, reduce environmental pollution and carbon emissions, and trace the source. Kau token is used to encourage enterprises and individuals to reduce carbon emissions.
overview.zh: 碳路者KAU是世界上首个使用区块链技术在环保和碳排放行业的落地解决方案，旨在促进环保事业发展、减少环境污染和碳排放、溯源的综合系统平台，利用KAU代币对企业和个人的低碳减排行为进行激励.
